subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] More from the Cellph. [5 Attachments]
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1248928165
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

that's what i do, use the head phone too, then put the radio(box) between  
the headphone, i lengthen the antenna, i put an extra piece of metal, with a 
 silver plated olive fork lol on it, i guess I'm trying to bring them in 
better,  and i record them using my pc program called "goldwave" sometimes i 
leave them  practice during the day and evening, they sometimes say stuff 
while i'm in the  middle of doing something, like cleaning, they are getting to 
be regular little  slave drivers, saying things like, "clean up"
 sometimes they ask what i'm cooking, they will tell me if one of the  
horse's gets out too, they make choices of what to watch on TV, it's strange i  
guess, i found a site that sells Silver wires for electric radios, here are 
a  few articles about silver wire: 
 
 
 
_Silver  wiring in guitar amps, is it really better?_ 
(http://www.diyguitarist.com/GuitarAmps/SilverMyth.htm)  
 
 
_DIY  silver interconnects - Agoraquest - Sony Forum, News, Reviews_ 
(http://www.agoraquest.com/viewtopic.php?forum=65&topic=28668)  
 
 
_Tron Syren  Preamplifier_ (http://www.soundscapehifi.com/tron-syren.htm)  
 
there are a few places you can buy silver wires, I need to look at it  
better.
 
In a message dated 7/30/2009 12:04:01 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
[_Attachment(s)_ (mip://01409178/default.html#TopText)   from Frank 
Sumption included below] 

Just killing time at work, I used the headphione adapter to copy the  audio 
to the computer. 
 
 F-S
